bibl.title: P. Oxy. 744.4 and Colossians 3,9.
bibl.note: P. Chester Beatty II Supplement (= van Haelst 497; P46). The negated present subjunctive mØ ceÊdhsye at Col. 3,9 may be the original reading of the text in Egypt and may perhaps reflect the original MS reading. Cf. P. Oxy. IV, 744, 4 (first cent. B.C.): mØ égvniòw. <me pseudesthe, me agoniais>
PORTER Stanley E., P. Oxy. 744.4 and Colossians 3,9.
